translation.en: [girl] Hi. Or should that be: [in British accent] How do you do?
translation.de: Hi. Oder sollte ich fragen: "Wie geht es Ihnen?"

translation.en: [chuckles] [in normal voice] I'm Zoe. I'm 15 and--
translation.de: Ich bin Zoe. Ich bin 15 und...

translation.en: Uh, guys? Guys? Wrong girl.
I'm the out-of-place American over here,
translation.de: Ich bin die deplatzierte Amerikanerin hier.

translation.en: and this is England.
Beautiful, isn't it?
This place smells of cow.
[Zoe] Yeah, now you come to mention it, there's a definite aroma.
translation.de: Ja, jetzt, wo du es erwähnst, gibt es hier so einen Geruch.

translation.en: That's my little sister, Rosie.
She's more LA than a wannabe actor sipping on kale juice.
translation.de: Sie ist typisch L.A., wie Möchtegernschauspieler, die Grünkohlsaft trinken.

translation.en: We've been walking for days.
Are we lost?
I know these roads like the back of my hand. I'm not lost.
translation.de: Ich kenne diese Straßen. Ich habe mich nicht verirrt.

translation.en: [Zoe] That's my mom. She's totally lost, in more ways than one.
translation.de: Das ist meine Mom. Sie hat sich verirrt, in vielerlei Hinsicht.

translation.en: -Ooh, look at that. -[bird squawking]
Is that a buzzard?
[Zoe] And that, my friends, is a really big horse.
translation.de: Das, liebe Freunde, ist ein echt großes Pferd.

translation.en: -Excuse me. -[Rosie gasps]
[Zoe] Sorry. Hope my sister didn't get in the way of your massive horse.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, meine kleine Schwester kam deinem Riesenpferd nicht in die Quere.

translation.en: My party shoes.
Did someone say party?
-Gramps! -[Frank] Zoe!
But how wonderful to see you!
Ah. I thought you were going to camp. Where's your dad?
translation.de: Ich dachte, ihr geht ins Ferienlager. Wo ist Dad?

translation.en: Long story.
Dad, you're not supposed to be driving.
translation.de: Dad, du sollst doch nicht fahren.

translation.en: I'm not supposed to be driving a car.
This isn't a car.
-Now, who wants a lift to the house? -[Rosie] Me.
Get on the back there. Right, that's it.
translation.de: Setz dich hinten rauf. Gut so.

translation.en: Welcome home.
[Rosie] Hit the gas, Gramps.
[Maggie] Don't encourage him.
Dad, slow down!
[Zoe] Things in LA got kind of complicated kind of quickly.
translation.de: In L.A. wurde die Lage ziemlich schnell ziemlich kompliziert.

translation.en: And I figure a summer vacay
on a tiny island off the coast of England is just what I need.
translation.de: auf einer kleinen englischen Insel wäre genau das Richtige für mich.

translation.en: Zero parental stress, zero weirdly possessive friends
-and absolutely zero drama. -[tires squealing]
[Rosie] Gramps, watch out!
[Rosie] It's okay, I'm fine.
Hmm, I'll get back to you about that whole zero drama thing.
♪ No matter what you're doin' ♪
[Frank] Come in, come in, come in, come in.
Yeah, yeah. Put it down.
It's all exactly the same.
[Frank] This is new.
-What do you think? -That is very British.
So, what happened to Huck?
-Oh, Dad's working. -Yeah, really hard. [chuckles]
-It's all good, though. I have his ticket. -You'd really rather spend the summer
translation.de: -Ich habe sein Ticket übernommen. -Du verbringst den Sommer lieber

translation.en: with your old grandpa than your friends?
translation.de: mit deinem Opa als deinen Freunden?

translation.en: Yeah. They'll be there when I get back.
translation.de: Ja, die sind da, wenn ich zurückkomme.

translation.en: Probably.
Mmm. Smells good, Gramps. What are you cooking?
translation.de: Riecht gut, Opa. Was kochst du?

translation.en: -Rabbit. -Mom, Grandpa's cooking Peter Rabbit.
-Couldn't you have done egg and chips? -She should know what real food is.
translation.de: -Hätten Kartoffeln und Ei es nicht getan? -Sie soll lernen, was echtes Essen ist.

translation.en: I suppose it's all rehydrated tofu burgers in LA.
translation.de: In L.A. gibt es doch nur rehydrierte Tofu-Burger.

translation.en: Are you really going there already?
translation.de: Fängst du jetzt schon damit an?

translation.en: [Frank] I'm just saying, it'll be good for them to spend time somewhere real.
translation.de: Ich meine ja nur. Es wird gut für sie, Zeit an einem echten Ort zu verbringen.

translation.en: Somewhere with a bit of soul.
-[Maggie] LA has soul, too. -Oh. [Maggie] If you'd get on a plane, I could show you.
translation.de: L.A. hat auch Seele. Ich kann sie dir gerne mal zeigen.

translation.en: -[Frank] The last thing I need is LA. -Perfect.
[Frank] I'm doing fine.
[Zoe] "Dear Maggie. The light will come through again. Love, Mama."
translation.de: "Liebe Maggie. Das Licht wird wieder scheinen. In Liebe, Mom."

translation.en: Cryptic. I like it.
[Rosie] Mom, why isn't the Wi-Fi working?
-[Frank] What's a Wi-Fi? -[Rosie] Mom!
That's it. That's it. I'm calling the embassy.
translation.de: Das reicht. Ich rufe die Botschaft an.

translation.en: Wi-Fi is a basic human right.
[Zoe] This is what I wanted, what I needed.
translation.de: Das ist genau, was ich wollte und brauchte.

translation.en: Just peace and quiet and...
Hello, jet lag.
[Maggie] Zoe!
-Rosie's missing. -[sighs]
-[Maggie] I've looked everywhere. -She's probably gone-- ugh! For a walk.
translation.de: -Ich habe überall gesucht. -Wahrscheinlich geht sie spazieren.

translation.en: -Rosie doesn't do walks. -[Maggie] She doesn't know these roads.
translation.de: -Rosie geht nie spazieren. -Sie kennt die Straßen nicht.

translation.en: -She doesn't know the dangers. -We're getting a little hysterical.
translation.de: -Es ist gefährlich. -Ich glaube, du wirst ein wenig hysterisch.

translation.en: -She's only been gone five minutes. -Grandpa, please, not helping.
translation.de: -Sie ist erst fünf Minuten weg. -Opa, das hilft nicht.

translation.en: Mom, relax, breathe. [inhales]
Remember your Yogalates. [exhales]
Right, yes. My breathing. Uh...
I'll go wait by the phone.
I'll find her. She couldn't have gone far.
translation.de: Ich suche sie. Sie kann nicht weit sein.

translation.en: -Is your mother always this... -Recently, yes.
translation.de: -Ist deine Mutter immer so? -In letzter Zeit, ja.

translation.en: You're not really here to nurse your invalid grandfather, are you?
translation.de: Du bist gar nicht hier, um dich um deinen kranken Opa zu kümmern, was?

translation.en: -No, Grandpa. -Thank goodness for that.
-I gotta go find Rosie. -Yeah.
Rosie!
[Zoe] This place is so beautiful.
It needs a coffee shop right there, but other than that, all good.
translation.de: Ein Coffeeshop fehlt, aber ansonsten ist alles gut.

translation.en: Ow. Excuse me, hi.
Hey, um, I don't suppose you've seen a ten-year-old girl about yea high,
translation.de: Hey, habt ihr eine Zehnjährige gesehen, die ungefähr so groß ist

translation.en: resembles an angry ball of glitter?
-You're American. -Oh, no, no, no, I'm French.
Really?
[Zoe] Is she serious?
I've never met a French person before.
translation.de: Ich habe noch nie eine Französin getroffen.

translation.en: Bonjour, stranger.
[Zoe] Oh, she's serious.
Okay, so, you haven't seen her?
translation.de: Ihr habt sie also nicht gesehen?

translation.en: Just because she's my little sister and she's on the loose.
translation.de: Sie ist meine kleine Schwester und läuft frei herum.

translation.en: No, but we'll keep an eye out.
translation.de: Nein. Wir werden die Augen offen halten.

translation.en: -Okay, all right. Thank you. Thank you. -Wait, wait, wait. Um...
What are you-- Why-- Um--
Translation: Who are you and what are you doing here?
translation.de: Übersetzung: Wer bist du, und was machst du hier?

translation.en: Oh, well, I'm Zoe.
I'm staying here for the summer at my gramps' house, over there.
translation.de: Ich verbringe den Sommer bei meinem Opa, da drüben.

translation.en: That's right by the stables. You should totally come and hang out.
translation.de: Das ist neben dem Pferdehof. Du solltest mit uns abhängen.

translation.en: You know, I'm not exactly what you'd call outdoorsy.
translation.de: Wisst ihr, ich bin nicht besonders gerne draußen.

translation.en: It's not all outdoorsy. Some of it's indoorsy.
translation.de: Es ist nicht alles draußen. Einiges ist auch drinnen.

translation.en: Yeah, it's pony camp soon.
Which is gonna be horsesome.
Horsesome's my word.
-It's a combination of horse and awesome. -Got it.
[woman] Girls!
Raven's escaped.
-What? -I want everyone back in the yard now.
-He's been stolen. He must have been. -You don't know that.
translation.de: -Er muss gestohlen worden sein. -Das weißt du nicht.

translation.en: The security in this place is utterly inadequate.
translation.de: Es fehlt hier an Sicherheitsvorkehrungen. Ich rufe die Polizei.

translation.en: -I'm gonna call the police -Let's not get ahead of ourselves.
translation.de: Es fehlt hier an Sicherheitsvorkehrungen. Ich rufe die Polizei. Wir sollten nichts überstürzen.

translation.en: -I'll drive around, see if I can find him. -[Zoe] Am I in a Jane Austen novel?
translation.de: -Ich werde ihn suchen fahren. -Ist das hier ein Jane-Austen-Roman?

translation.en: Have I gone back in time?
-What is this place? -[Sam] Marcus.
[Zoe] You've got to be kidding me.
translation.de: Das darf doch wohl nicht wahr sein.

translation.en: No one looks like that in real life.
translation.de: Im echten Leben sieht niemand so aus.

translation.en: -Did I say that out loud? -Huh?
Let's hope Raven comes quietly.
Who's Raven?
-He's-- -Just a horse.
-[Becky] A scary horse. -I'm really worried, Daddy.
translation.de: -Ein Pferd. -Ein furchterregendes. Ich mache mir Sorgen, Daddy. Er ist außer Rand und Band.

translation.en: He's totally out of control.
translation.de: Ich mache mir Sorgen, Daddy. Er ist außer Rand und Band.

translation.en: I'm sure your sister will be fine.
-Can I borrow this? -[Becky] Of course.
Uh, that's my bike.
Be careful.
That girl is the definition of horsesome.
translation.de: Das Mädchen ist der Inbegriff von pferdomenal.

translation.en: It'll catch on, Jade. Just you wait.
translation.de: Es wird sich durchsetzen, Jade. Warte nur ab.

translation.en: [Zoe] Okay, detective mode engaged.
Where would a very small, very angry little sister hide?
translation.de: Wo würde eine kleine, wütende Schwester sich verstecken?

translation.en: Okay, let's see.
Pier, picturesque.
But no Rosie.
Woods, whole lot of trees.
No Rosie.
Rosie!
Rosie!
Rosie!
Rosie!
Oh, God, no.
Oh, no.
Oh, no, please don't hurt her.
translation.de: Oh nein. Bitte tu ihr nichts.

translation.en: -That's the girl looking for her sister. -Rope and sedatives now, Marcus.
translation.de: -Sie sucht ihre Schwester. -Seil und Beruhigungsmittel, Marcus.

translation.en: Just stay very still!
[Zoe] No, no, no. Okay.
You must be Raven. Okay.
It's okay, it's okay.
It's okay.
Okay, okay, okay. Relax, relax.
It's all okay.
It's okay.
Wait, wait, wait. Look.
I've never seen him so calm.
translation.de: Ich habe ihn noch nie so ruhig gesehen.

translation.en: Rough day, huh?
Yeah. Yeah.
Just stay very still.
-[whinnies] -Hey, hey, no, no.
-Whoa, whoa, whoa. -Here.
Stop it, don't be like that. Your friends are here to take you home.
translation.de: Hey, hör auf. Deine Freunde wollen dich nach Hause bringen.

translation.en: -[whinnies] -Whoa, whoa. Hey, hey, hey, Britain's Next Top Model... I don't think he likes that pointy thing.
translation.de: Hey, Britain's Next Topmodel... Er mag das spitze Ding nicht.

translation.en: -Easy, Miss America. It's just a sedative. -We just need to get him under control.
translation.de: -Es ist Sedativum, Miss America. -Wir müssen ihn unter Kontrolle bringen.

translation.en: He was under control.
No needles. No sedatives. Just back off.
translation.de: Keine Spritzen. Keine Beruhigungsmittel. Gehen Sie zurück.

translation.en: I said, back off.
Okay, I get it, I get it. You like to be free. I get it.
translation.de: Ok, verstehe. Du bist gerne frei. Schon klar.

translation.en: What's your name?
-Zoe. -[Sam] Okay, Zoe.
Raven seems to really like you.
Could you help us get him back to the stables?
translation.de: Kannst du uns helfen, ihn zum Hof zurückzubringen?

translation.en: Uh, look, I would love to help you with your scary horse,
translation.de: Ich würde gern mit dem furchterregenden Pferd helfen,

translation.en: I really would, but I need to find my sister.
translation.de: wirklich, aber ich muss meine Schwester finden.

translation.en: Thing is, it's kind of you or the sedative.
translation.de: Entweder du hilfst, oder er kriegt das Beruhigungsmittel.

translation.en: Listen. If you help us out, we'll help you find your sister.
translation.de: Wenn du uns hilfst, helfen wir dir, deine Schwester zu finden.

translation.en: -Okay, what do you want me to do? -We need to get this rope clipped on him.
translation.de: -Ok. Was soll ich tun? -Wir müssen ihm dieses Seil anlegen.

translation.en: Okay, okay.
Hey. Okay.
Oh, hey, hey. Shh, shh. Come here.
That's great. We need you to walk him back to the stables,
translation.de: Prima. Gehe mit ihm zurück zum Hof.

translation.en: and we'll be right behind you. If he does anything, we are right there.
translation.de: Wir bleiben hinter dir. Wenn er was anstellt, sind wir da.

translation.en: Okay, okay. All right.
Okay.
Shh. It's okay, it's okay.
Couple of horse thefts on the mainland. It could be related.
translation.de: Auf dem Festland wurden mehrere Pferde gestohlen.

translation.en: [Mia] Horse thieves?
-I knew it. -He only said it could be.
translation.de: -Ich wusste es. -Es ist nur eine Option.

translation.en: It must have been a gang.
It'd take at least four men, four big men, to control that horse. He's utterly wild.
translation.de: Man braucht vier starke Männer, um dieses wilde Pferd zu kontrollieren.

translation.en: [Mia] Daddy.
[Becky] This is so going on my blog.
Thank you so much, Zoe. We've got it from here.
[Marcus] Ted, can you give me a hand?
[Ted] Steady, boy.
Steady, boy.
[Sam] Take him to the stables and get him checked over.
translation.de: Bringt ihn in den Stall und untersucht ihn.

translation.en: [Zoe] See you soon... I guess.
translation.de: Man sieht sich. Nehme ich an.

translation.en: [Sam] Okay, everyone, show's over. Let's get back to work.
translation.de: Ok, die Show ist vorbei. Zurück an die Arbeit.

translation.en: -It was a false alarm, Officer. -It's Derek.
-[Sam] I'm so sorry to waste your time. -No time wasted.
It's always good to see you. I mean, to see the yard.
translation.de: Es ist immer schön, Sie zu sehen. Den Hof, meine ich.

translation.en: Although I'd advise a review of your alarms and CCTV.
translation.de: Sie sollten vielleicht eine Alarmanlage und Kameras installieren.

translation.en: We'll look into it. Yes, you will.
translation.de: -Wir denken drüber nach. -Ja, das werden Sie.

translation.en: How's my favorite horse whisperer?
I'm okay. I just need to find my sister.
translation.de: Gut. Aber ich muss meine Schwester finden.

translation.en: Right, of course.
Girls.
Wait, wait, wait.
These are Rosie's.
She's not out there. She's in here. Somewhere.
translation.de: Sie ist nicht da draußen, sie ist drinnen. Irgendwo.

translation.en: [Zoe] Seriously, I'm like some kind of wilderness tracker, right?
translation.de: Ich bin echt eine tolle Fährtenfinderin, was?

translation.en: We'll help you look. We know all the best hiding places here.
translation.de: Wir helfen dir suchen. Wir kennen die besten Verstecke.

translation.en: -Thanks, girls. -We were playing hide-and-seek once,
translation.de: Danke, Mädels. Ich wurde beim Spielen mal in der Toilette eingeschlossen.

translation.en: and I got stuck in a Portaloo.
translation.de: Ich wurde beim Spielen mal in der Toilette eingeschlossen.

translation.en: -I thought she'd gone home. -I was in there for six hours.
translation.de: -Ich dachte, sie wäre gegangen. -Sechs Stunden lang.

translation.en: I got the best photo of you and Raven. Totally posting it.
translation.de: Ich hab ein tolles Foto von dir und Raven. Ich werde es posten.

translation.en: "Mysterious Frenchwoman hypnotizes crazy horse."
I didn't hypnotize him.
[Jade] And she's not French.
-[Becky] It's still huge. -[Jade] Rosie?
Raven's the wildest horse in the yard.
translation.de: Raven ist das wildeste Pferd hier.

translation.en: What's his problem?
No one knows for sure.
He never lets anyone close enough to find out.
translation.de: Er lässt niemanden an sich ran.

translation.en: [Jade] Rosie?
Apart from you.
Maybe he's your destiny.
-[Jade] Rosie, are you in here? -Maybe.
Rosie, are you--?
Hey, boy.
This really isn't a very good hiding place.
translation.de: Das hier ist kein gutes Versteck.

translation.en: -Raven's in here, for starters. -It's okay. It's okay, it's just me.
translation.de: -Raven ist hier drin. -Alles gut. Ich bin's.

translation.en: We should probably go.
-Careful. -It's okay.
So, I'm looking for my little sister.
She's a runaway, like you.
Here. See if he wants one of these.
translation.de: Hier. Vielleicht will er einen davon.

translation.en: Ah, so, that's how you brought Raven home.
translation.de: So hast du Raven also nach Hause geholt.

translation.en: -You bribed him with sweets. -Told you it'd be something like that.
translation.de: -Du hast ihn bestochen. -Hab ich doch gesagt.

translation.en: I mean, it is pretty impressive.
You know, you are the talk of the yard.
translation.de: Der ganze Hof redet über dich.

translation.en: -[chuckles] I am? -I'm Mia.
-I hope these two aren't bothering you. -No, no, they're cool.
translation.de: -Ich hoffe, die beiden nerven nicht. -Nein, sie sind cool.

translation.en: We were helping her look for her sister.
translation.de: Wir helfen, ihre Schwester zu suchen.

translation.en: -I suppose you think Raven's eaten her. -Of course not. [chuckles]
translation.de: -Ihr denkt, Raven hat sie gefressen? -Natürlich nicht.

translation.en: -Have you? -[Mia] Run along. I can take things from here.
My dad practically owns the stables.
translation.de: Der Hof gehört quasi meinem Vater.

translation.en: [Susie] We can show you how things really work around here.
translation.de: Wir können dir zeigen, was hier wirklich abgeht.

translation.en: -Take my number. We should hang out. -Oh.
Are you two still here?
translation.de: Ihr seid ja immer noch hier.

translation.en: [Jade] Bye, then.
-I hope you find your sister. -Wait, wait.
Uh, you know, my phone died.
-Oh. -Yeah, it does that sometimes.
Especially when people are being mean.
translation.de: Vor allem, wenn Leute fies sind.

translation.en: -I don't think I get your meaning. -No, I think you do.
Suit yourself.
Girls, would you mind staying away from my horse?
translation.de: Mädels, haltet euch von meinem Pferd fern.

translation.en: He's had such a crazy day.
Raven is your horse?
That's right, he's mine.
But don't worry,
there are plenty of other horses in the stables suitable for tourists.
translation.de: Es gibt hier noch viele andere Pferde, die für Touristen geeignet sind.

translation.en: I can send you that photo, so you have something to remember him by.
translation.de: Ich schicke dir das Foto. Dann kannst du dich an ihn erinnern.

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
We'll have to go to the haystack. The Wi-Fi's strongest there.
translation.de: Lasst uns zum Heuhaufen gehen. Da ist das WLAN am stärksten.

translation.en: You guys have Wi-Fi?
-What are you doing? -Oh.
Hey, sis.
I was just texting Angela and she said that they're having a really good time.
translation.de: Ich habe mit Angela getextet. Sie sagt, dass sie alle echt Spaß haben.

translation.en: We thought a wild horse had run off with you. A wild horse? Get a grip, sis.
translation.de: -Wir dachten, ein Pferd wäre mit dir weg. -Ein Pferd? Komm mal wieder klar.

translation.en: -You found her, then? -[Zoe] Yes. Now we're leaving.
translation.de: -Du hast sie gefunden? -Ja. Wir gehen jetzt.

translation.en: Why the rush?
Hi, my name's Rosie, but you can call me Rosie.
translation.de: Hi, ich heiße Rosie. Du kannst mich Rosie nennen.

translation.en: -Or just call me. -[chuckles]
Ignore her. Home. Now.
-Call me. -I'll see you around.
Oh, my God. Hot Marcus totally looked at your face.
translation.de: Oh, mein Gott. Der Heiße Marcus hat dich angeschaut.

translation.en: Don't most people look at your face when they're talking to you?
translation.de: Die meisten schauen einen an, wenn man sich unterhält.

translation.en: I'd steer clear if I were you.
Mia's basically cocked her leg and peed on him.
translation.de: Mia hat sozusagen ihr Bein gehoben und ihn angepinkelt.

translation.en: -That's disgusting. -Excuse me.
What happened to "Home. Now"?
I'm coming.
Thank you guys so much. I'll see you later.
translation.de: Vielen Dank, Leute. Wir sehen uns.

translation.en: Wait.
Um, just wondering-- Maybe not.
translation.de: Ich frage mich... Oder auch nicht...

translation.en: You've probably got way better offers-- -She's asking for your number. -Oh.
translation.de: -Du hast sicher bessere Angebote. -Sie will deine Nummer.

translation.en: You told Mia your phone was dead.
translation.de: Du hast Mia gesagt, es wäre alle.

translation.en: Give me them digits.
Make sure you put all the sedatives back in the medical cabinet.
translation.de: Stell alle Beruhigungsmittel wieder in den Medikamentenschrank.

translation.en: -Can't afford to buy more right now. -Yeah, of course.
translation.de: -Wir können uns keine neuen leisten. -Ja, sicher.

translation.en: -Luckily, we didn't have to use any today. -I know. Thanks to that girl.
translation.de: -Zum Glück brauchten wir heute keine. -Ja, dank des Mädchens.

translation.en: -Zoe. -Right.
-I still can't get over it. -I know, she was amazing.
translation.de: -Ich fasse es immer noch nicht. -Ja, sie war klasse.

translation.en: I put Raven in the field. He was going crazy in his stable.
translation.de: Ich habe Raven aufs Feld gelassen. Im Stall drehte er durch.

translation.en: I'll bring him in before it gets dark. Better safe than sorry at the moment.
translation.de: Ich hole ihn rein, bevor es dunkel wird. Vorsicht ist besser als Nachsicht.

translation.en: [Zoe] Mom was really worried.
[Rosie] Mom gets worried if I walk under a ladder.
translation.de: Das tut sie bei jedem Anlass.

translation.en: [Zoe] Just because you can't get Wi-Fi, doesn't mean you can go off and disappear.
translation.de: Zwei Minuten ohne WLAN bedeuten nicht, dass du einfach verschwinden darfst.

translation.en: You know I feel funny when I can't get online.
translation.de: Ich fühle mich seltsam, wenn ich nicht online bin.

translation.en: You are not a baby, Ro.
Then stop treating me like one.
translation.de: Dann hör auf, mich so zu behandeln.

translation.en: Dad chose not to come with us, didn't he?
translation.de: Dad wollte nicht mit uns kommen, oder?

translation.en: No, he had work. You know that.
translation.de: Nein, er musste arbeiten. Das weißt du.

translation.en: -He's busy. -Whatever.
As soon as we get to Grandpa's, I'm Googling the Constitution.
translation.de: Wenn wir bei Opa sind, google ich die Verfassung.

translation.en: [Zoe] What the...?
-What? -Nothing.
I'm wondering why you didn't use the gate.
translation.de: Warum benutzt du nicht das Tor?

translation.en: Spying, are you?
Spying? No, I'm not spying. I'm just passing.
translation.de: Nein, ich spioniere nicht. Ich gehe nur vorbei.

translation.en: -I'm staying with my grandpa. -I know.
Have a look.
-What? -You obviously think I'm up to something.
translation.de: -Was? -Du denkst, ich führe etwas im Schilde.

translation.en: So, go on. Have a look.
-No, thanks. -Suit yourself.
[Zoe] Mysterious bags and boys coming out of bushes.
translation.de: Geheimnisvolle Taschen und Jungs, die aus Büschen kommen.

translation.en: Ah, this place has got it all.
Looks like Frank's got guests up at the house.
-A woman and-- -The girl who brought the dark horse in.
translation.de: -Eine Frau und... -Das Mädchen, welches das Pferd fing.

translation.en: -There's something about her. -Ah.
-The way she handled Raven, I mean... -[sighs]
translation.de: So, wie sie mit Raven umging...

translation.en: She's different.
A girl like that will break your heart given half a chance.
translation.de: Sie wird dir das Herz brechen, wenn sie die Chance hat.

translation.en: -Who said I'd give her a chance? -I mean it, son.
translation.de: -Wer sagt, dass ich ihr eine Chance gebe? -Ich meine es ernst.

translation.en: -Leave well alone. -What's it to you?
translation.de: -Lass sie in Ruhe. -Was interessiert es dich?

translation.en: Her family are trouble.
You think everyone's trouble.
Don't say I didn't warn you.
[Maggie] Right, that's one very grubby daughter in the bath.
translation.de: Gut, eine schmuddelige Tochter sitzt in der Wanne.

translation.en: -Where exactly did you find her? -The stables.
translation.de: -Wo hast du sie gefunden? -Auf dem Pferdehof.

translation.en: -The stables? -[Zoe] Mm-hmm. Yeah, they had Wi-Fi.
translation.de: Dem Pferdehof? Ja, da gibt es WLAN.

translation.en: [chuckling] Poor you, having to deal with a bunch of pony princesses.
translation.de: Du Arme musstest dich mit Pony-Prinzessinnen rumschlagen?

translation.en: No, they weren't--
Tomorrow I'll go into the village and set Grandpa up with the Internet.
translation.de: Morgen gehe ich ins Dorf und besorge Opa Internet.

translation.en: Oh, no. I don't need you coming over here, bringing all your new-fangled LA ideas.
translation.de: Nein, ich will deine neumodischen L.A.-Ideen nicht.

translation.en: [laughs] It's not an LA thing. It's the whole world.
translation.de: Es ist kein L.A.-Ding. Es ist die ganze Welt.

translation.en: -It's about time you caught up. -[sighs]
translation.de: Du musst mit der Zeit gehen.

translation.en: [Rosie] Mom, where's my strawberry glitter shampoo?
So, you liked the stables, then?
Yeah, yeah, I did.
[Frank] Bright Fields is a good place.
I just hope young Sam can keep it going.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, Sam kann ihn am Laufen halten.

translation.en: -Mom doesn't seem to think much of it. -[mutters]
translation.de: -Mom scheint den Hof nicht zu mögen. -Ich weiß.

translation.en: Maggie's always been more of a city girl.
translation.de: Maggie war schon immer ein Stadttyp.

translation.en: Now, where were we?
[Maggie] What are you doing up here?
This better be good. I'm about to dive into a world of knights and ghosts and--
translation.de: Ich will in eine Welt eintauchen voller Ritter, Geister und...

translation.en: Vampire cats?
Myths and Legends.
I used to love that book when I was your age.
translation.de: Das Buch habe ich in deinem Alter geliebt.

translation.en: I wanted to say thank you for today.
translation.de: Ich wollte dir für heute danken.

translation.en: You've been a star.
-I'm sorry for being such a-- -Massively overprotective drama queen?
translation.de: -Tut mir leid, dass ich so... -Überfürsorglich und hysterisch bin?

translation.en: I was gonna go with "concerned mom."
Having Rosie to chase round the island will give you something to do this summer.
translation.de: Mit der Suche nach Rosie hast du im Sommer wenigstens etwas zu tun.

translation.en: Mm, right after I come up with new and interesting ways to lie about Dad.
translation.de: Und mit dem Erfinden neuer Lügen über Dad.

translation.en: -I'm sorry, Mom-- -It's okay.
Your dad and I just need a bit of time apart to figure out...
translation.de: Dein Vater und ich brauchen Abstand, um zu sehen...

translation.en: where we're going wrong.
Yeah. Yeah.
Enjoy the book.
Thank you.
[Zoe] And now, finally, the total peace and quiet can begin.
translation.de: Nun ist endlich Zeit für Frieden und Ruhe.

translation.en: No more panicking moms, no more lost sisters,
translation.de: Keine panischen Mütter, keine verschollenen Schwestern

translation.en: and no more dangerous wild horses.
[Zoe] I said, no more wild horses.
[Zoe] Check me out, totally resisting.
translation.de: Schaut mal, wie toll ich widerstehen kann.

translation.en: Nope, mnh-mnh, not interested.
[Zoe] Ah... who am I kidding?
Hey, boy. Hey.
I just wanted to come and say good night.
We're famous.
Hey. What's wrong?
Is someone there?
Tch. It's okay. It's just you and me.
translation.de: Alles gut. Wir beide sind allein.

translation.en: There's nothing to be scared of.
I promise.
